title: Replays
body:
hello pals is there anyway to download a past match I've played and be able to watch it
thanks in advance

replies.body:
I use [replay.gg](http://www.replay.gg/), it's probably the best service out. Otherwise there's also [LOLReplay](http://www.leaguereplays.com/download/) and [Baron Replays](https://ahri.tw/en/Download/).

Those both require a download though, which is why I think replay.gg is the best.
LOLReplay will cause client crashes. I highly recommend [**SkinSpotlights Replays**](http://www.skinspotlights.com/p/skinspotlights-replays.html).

when i try to play back the replay, it says broken replay or replay still recording
i've waited for half hour
is there something i need to setup for it to work or?
